phrs.translation: 微光, 闪光, 微光之源, 闪烁
飞虎狂龙, 魔鬼尖兵, 英文名
一线希望, 希望之光基金会, 一丝希望
一线希望, 微弱的希望, 希望的微光, 希望微光

sentences.sentence: In the east there is the slightest glimmer of light.
sentences.translation: 东方有一丝闪烁的微光。

sentences.sentence: Despite an occasional glimmer of hope, this campaign has not produced any results.
sentences.translation: 尽管偶尔有一线希望，这次宣传活动并没有产生任何结果。

sentences.sentence: How glad he was when at last he caught the glimmer of a light!
sentences.translation: 当他终于看到一丝光亮时，他是多么高兴啊！
